subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The apparent weariness of the Mets’ staff this season contrasts with the endurance of Tom Seaver and Jerry Koosman, who combined for 11 complete-game victories in the final month of the 1969 regular season.
snippet: The apparent weariness of the Mets’ staff this season contrasts with the endurance of Tom Seaver and Jerry Koosman, who combined for 11 complete-game victories in the final month of the 1969 regular season.
